nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Jedi in Training

The Clone Wars: Jedi in Training is a Star Wars Legends Level 2 DK Readers title retelling Jedi Padawan Ahsoka Tano's journey during the events of the film Star Wars: The Clone Wars. It was written by Heather Scott and was published by DK Publishing on July 20, 2009.
The book was reissued with new cover art under the title Ahsoka: Jedi in Training as part of the Learn to Read with Star Wars: Leia Level 2 box set on December 12, 2017.
Get your child hooked on reading as they meet Ahsoka from Star Wars' Clone Wars series as she trains to become a Jedi.

Designed to engage even the most reluctant reader, this fun-packed Clone Wars Reader is all about your child's favourite heroine, Ahsoka. They'll find out all about Ahsoka's adventures under the wing of different Jedi's – Anakin, Luminara Unduli and Plo Koon – and see how she learns to trust her Jedi instincts and to work as part of a team.
Packed with pictures from The Clone Wars series, it's an out-of-this-world read. And don't forget, there's a galaxy-full of DK Star Wars books to collect.
Join Ahsoka Tano as she trains to become a Jedi during the dangerous times of the Clone Wars.
